The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image claims that it is the first consignment of locally grown vegetables and fruits being exported to America.
Airport authorities in Sri Lanka: specifically Upali Kalansooriya and Ravi De Silva, confirmed that the consignment in the image was actually exported to Muscat, Oman, not the US.
A report by a Sri Lankan news site: Newswire, also mentioned the export of fruit and vegetables to Oman, supporting the claim made by the airport authorities.
